item.title: I was a Financial Criminal on Habbo as a Child
item.description: â€œThinkâ€¦ Think of something that is important to youâ€¦â€ The bird chirped on the sill of the window. â€œOf how the colors blend, of the smell of packed mortadella sandwich lunches, yoghurt and gouache. Of kindergarten and sunny days. Of how happy and full your heart was. Ofâ€¦â€ And then it flew away, mid-sentence, not letting my imagination catch up to what the chirps and birdsongs couldâ€™ve meant. I canâ€™t really think of anything significant.
